TextView.android:text: Indians have deep love and devotion for their regional identities in terms of tradition and culture. While every region in India has its unique presence, Malwa stands tall as a region that has promoted, nurtured its culture and traditions. Once ruled by the Holkars, Malwa region has always given special attention to its artists irrespective of their art form. Malwa region has the unique benefit of its proximity with Maharashtra, Gujrat and Rajasthan giving it a rich heritage and cultural lineage. This region has produced great poets like ‘Kalidas, mathematicians like Bhrathari, astronomers like vrahmihir and bramhgupta and many more. Polymath King Bhoj also ruled this region. Modern day artists like Lata Mangeshkar hails from malwa!
